/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
